scripts.text:
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  s.scoring_group_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON t.share_id = sa.share_id
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group s ON sa.account_id = s.account_id
WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2020-01-01'::date
  AND t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY s.scoring_group_id, date, financial_stat_type_code_id

WITH latest_transactions AS (
  SELECT
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date::date AS txn_date,
    t.balance
  FROM (
    SELECT
      t.*,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date ORDER BY t.transaction_id DESC) as rn
    FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  ) t
  WHERE t.rn = 1
),
daily_balances AS (
  SELECT
    sa.account_id,
    lt.txn_date,
    SUM(lt.balance) AS total_balance
  FROM latest_transactions lt
  JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON lt.share_id = sa.share_id
  GROUP BY sa.account_id, lt.txn_date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (scoring_group_id, date, value,financial_stat_type_code_id )
SELECT
  sg.scoring_group_id,
  db.txn_date AS date,
  db.total_balance AS balance, 
  4
FROM daily_balances db
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group sg ON sg.account_id = db.account_id;

WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series('2020-01-01'::date,'2025-10-31'::date, interval '1 day')
),
groups AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT scoring_group_id
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
),
all_combinations AS (
  SELECT g.scoring_group_id, d.dt AS date
  FROM groups g CROSS JOIN date_range d
)
insert into fss_stg.stg_missing_ending_bal(
scoring_group_id, 
date) 
SELECT ac.scoring_group_id, ac.date
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat agfs
  ON agfs.scoring_group_id = ac.scoring_group_id
  AND agfs.date = ac.date
  AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
WHERE agfs.financial_stat_id IS NULL;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (
  value,
  date,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  scoring_group_id,
  created_date,
  created_by
)
SELECT
  prev.value,
  tm.date,
  4,
  tm.scoring_group_id,
  NOW() AS created_date,
  'system' AS created_by
FROM fss_stg.stg_missing_ending_bal tm
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat agfs
  WHERE agfs.scoring_group_id = tm.scoring_group_id
    AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    AND agfs.date < tm.date
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) prev ON true AND
prev.value IS NOT null

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
(
   scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    value
)
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
    FROM generate_series(
        '2020-01-01'::date,
        CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
        INTERVAL '1 day'
    )
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.scoring_group_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL '29 days' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.scoring_group_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        scoring_group_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
    WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  9,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
  scoring_group_id,
  date,
  SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
  scoring_group_id,
  date,
  SUM(value)::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (7,8)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)

  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  10,
  date,

FROM vals

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(value) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date

),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  12,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
deposits AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS income
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 6
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.income -  n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN deposits d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  11,
  date,
  diff
FROM vals

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
balances AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS balance
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.balance -  n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN balances d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  13,
  date,
  diff
FROM vals
TRUNCATE TABLE fss_stg.stg_missing_ending_bal CASCADE;

UPDATE ch_fss."transaction" t
SET transaction_type_code_id = CASE
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 AND t.payment_method = 'F' THEN 3
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 THEN 2
    WHEN t.transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1
    ELSE transaction_type_code_id  -- keep existing if none match
END;
TRUNCATE TABLE ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat CASCADE;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat
(
    share_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    value
)
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
    FROM generate_series(
        '2020-01-01'::date,
        CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
        INTERVAL '1 day'
    )
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.share_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL '29 days' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.share_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        share_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    share_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum

numerators AS (

      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum

)

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
WHERE t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
WHERE t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;

      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL '29 days' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day

FROM mapped_avg

text.value:
@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  s.scoring_group_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON t.share_id = sa.share_id
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group s ON sa.account_id = s.account_id
WHERE t.transaction_date >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
'''
AND t.transaction_date < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
'''
GROUP BY s.scoring_group_id, date, financial_stat_type_code_id;'
)

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(scoring_group_id, date, value, financial_stat_type_code_id, created_date, created_by)
SELECT
    sg.scoring_group_id,
    agg.date,
    agg.total_value,
    4,
    NOW() AS created_date,
    ''system'' AS created_by
FROM
(
    SELECT sa.account_id, sfs.date, SUM(sfs.value) AS total_value
    FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
    JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON sa.share_id = sfs.share_id
    WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
    pipeline().parameters.start_date,
    '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
    pipeline().parameters.end_date,
    '''
    AND sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    GROUP BY sa.account_id, sfs.date
) agg
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group sg ON sg.account_id = agg.account_id;'
)

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
(
   scoring_group_id,
   financial_stat_type_code_id,
   date,
   value
)
WITH date_series AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series(''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
'''::date, ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
'''::date - interval ''1 day'', interval ''1 day'')
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.scoring_group_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL ''29 days'' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.scoring_group_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        scoring_group_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;'
)

@concat(
'WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
 pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  ''' 
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  9,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals;'
)

@concat(
'WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(
      CASE 
        WHEN financial_stat_type_code_id = 7 THEN abs(value)
        WHEN financial_stat_type_code_id = 8 THEN value
        ELSE 0 -- in case other codes appear
      END
    )::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
 pipeline().parameters.end_date,

      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL

    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)

@concat(
'WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,

    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
deposits AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS income

)

scripts.text:
UPDATE ch_fss."transaction" t
SET transaction_type_code_id = CASE
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 AND t.payment_method = 'F' THEN 3
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 THEN 2
    WHEN t.transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1
    ELSE transaction_type_code_id  -- keep existing if none match
END;

text.value:
@concat(
'DELETE FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
WHERE date >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
''' 
AND date < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
''';'
)

@concat('
INSERT INTO fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
WHERE t.transaction_date::date >= ''',
 pipeline().parameters.start_date,
 '''::date
  AND t.transaction_date::date <= ''',
 pipeline().parameters.end_date,
 '''::date
  AND t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;
')

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  WHERE t.transaction_date >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  ''' 
  and t.transaction_date  < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;'
)

@concat(
'WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series(''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''::date, ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''::date - interval ''1 day'', interval ''1 day'')
),
groups AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT share_id
  FROM ch_fss.share_account sa
  WHERE sa.close_date IS NULL
),
all_combinations AS (
  SELECT g.share_id, d.dt AS date
  FROM groups g CROSS JOIN date_range d
)
INSERT INTO fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal(
  share_id, 
  date
) 
SELECT ac.share_id, ac.date
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  ON agfs.share_id = ac.share_id
  AND agfs.date = ac.date
  AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
WHERE agfs.financial_stat_id IS NULL;'
)

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  value,
  date,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  share_id,
  created_date,
  created_by
)
SELECT
  prev.value,
  tm.date,
  4,
  tm.share_id,
  NOW() AS created_date,
  ''system'' AS created_by
FROM fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal tm
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value
  FROM  ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  WHERE agfs.share_id = tm.share_id
    AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    AND agfs.date < tm.date
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) prev ON true
AND prev.value IS NOT null;'
)

scripts.text: TRUNCATE TABLE fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal CASCADE;

''';'
)

scripts.text:
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  s.scoring_group_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON t.share_id = sa.share_id
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group s ON sa.account_id = s.account_id
WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2020-01-01'::date
  AND t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY s.scoring_group_id, date, financial_stat_type_code_id

INSERT INTO  ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(scoring_group_id, date, value,financial_stat_type_code_id,created_date, created_by)
SELECT
    sg.scoring_group_id,
    agg.date,
    agg.total_value,
    4,
    NOW() AS created_date,
  'system' AS created_by
FROM
(
    select sa.account_id, sfs.date, sum(sfs.value) as total_value
    from ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
    join ch_fss.share_account sa on sa.share_id = sfs.share_id
    where sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    group by sa.account_id, sfs.date
) agg
JOIN  ch_fss.scoring_group sg ON sg.account_id = agg.account_id

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
(
   scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    value
)
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
    FROM generate_series(
        '2020-01-01'::date,
        CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
        INTERVAL '1 day'
    )
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.scoring_group_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL '29 days' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.scoring_group_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        scoring_group_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
    WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  9,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
  scoring_group_id,
  date,
  SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
  scoring_group_id,
  date,
  SUM(value)::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (7,8)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)

)
SELECT

FROM vals

WITH denominators AS (

numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,

  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  11,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
deposits AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS income
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 5
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.income -  n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN deposits d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  12,
  date,
  diff*30
FROM vals

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
balances AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS balance
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.balance -  n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN balances d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  13,
  date,
  diff*30
FROM vals

UPDATE ch_fss."transaction" t
SET transaction_type_code_id = CASE
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 AND t.payment_method = 'F' THEN 3
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 THEN 2
    WHEN t.transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1
    ELSE transaction_type_code_id  -- keep existing if none match
END;
TRUNCATE TABLE ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat CASCADE;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  s.scoring_group_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON t.share_id = sa.share_id
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group s ON sa.account_id = s.account_id
WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2025-09-20'::date
  AND t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
  AND s.scoring_group_id = 2163
GROUP BY s.scoring_group_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id
ON CONFLICT (scoring_group_id, financial_stat_type_code_id, date)
DO UPDATE SET
  value = EXCLUDED.value;

INSERT INTO  ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(scoring_group_id, date, value,financial_stat_type_code_id,created_date, created_by)
SELECT
    sg.scoring_group_id,
    agg.date,
    agg.total_value,
    4,
    NOW() AS created_date,
  'system' AS created_by
FROM
(
    select sa.account_id, sfs.date, sum(sfs.value) as total_value
    from ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
    join ch_fss.share_account sa on sa.share_id = sfs.share_id
    where sfs.share_id = 2110070001
    and sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    group by sa.account_id, sfs.date
) agg
JOIN  ch_fss.scoring_group sg ON sg.account_id = agg.account_id

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
(
   scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    value
)
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
    FROM generate_series(
        '2025-09-20'::date,
        CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
        INTERVAL '1 day'
    )
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.scoring_group_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.scoring_group_id = 2163
    AND sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL '29 days' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.scoring_group_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        scoring_group_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs.scoring_group_id = 2163
  and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs.scoring_group_id = 2163
  and financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
    WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)

FROM vals

WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs.scoring_group_id = 2163
  and financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
deposits AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS income
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs.scoring_group_id = 2163
  and financial_stat_type_code_id = 5
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.income -  n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN deposits d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)

UPDATE ch_fss."transaction" t
SET transaction_type_code_id = CASE
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 AND t.payment_method = 'F' THEN 3
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 THEN 2
    WHEN t.transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1
    ELSE transaction_type_code_id  -- keep existing if none match
END;
delete from ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat where scoring_group_id= 2163

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat
(
    share_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    value
)
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
    FROM generate_series(
        '2020-01-01'::date,
        CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day',
        INTERVAL '1 day'
    )
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.share_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL '29 days' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.share_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        share_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    share_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;

WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id IN (5, 7)
  GROUP BY share_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    share_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.share_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE

      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.share_id = d.share_id
   AND n.date = d.date
)

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
WHERE t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;

WITH last_watermark AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(MAX("date")) AS last_date
  FROM fss1.watermark_table
  WHERE source_table = 'ch_transaction_1 ct'
)
INSERT INTO fss1.share_group_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  ct.share_id,
  ct.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  ct.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(ct.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM fss1.ch_transaction_1 ct
WHERE ct.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY ct.share_id, ct.transaction_date::date, ct.transaction_type_code_id

UNION ALL

SELECT
  ct.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  ct.transaction_date::date AS date,
  ct.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (share_id, transaction_date::date)
    share_id,
    transaction_date,
    balance,
    transaction_id
  FROM fss1.ch_transaction_1
  ORDER BY share_id, transaction_date::date, transaction_id DESC
) ct;
